scripts.dependencies: rm -fr src/common-model && cp -R ../_shared/common-model src/common-model && rm -fr src/utils-std-ts && cp -R ../_shared/utils-std-ts src/utils-std-ts
scripts.dev: DEV_MODE=true TELEPATHY_CONFIG=../_dev/config/config-server.json TELEPATHY_DATA_DIR=../_dev/data/server pm2 start ts-node --watch --name server -- -P tsconfig.json ./src/app.ts
scripts.binary:linux:alpine: npm run build && pkg dist/app.js --target alpine --output ./dist/telepathy-server-linux-alpine
scripts.binary:linux:x64: npm run build && pkg dist/app.js --target node14-linux-x64 --output ./dist/telepathy-server-linux-x64
scripts.binary:linux:armv6: npm run build && pkg dist/app.js --target node14-linux-armv6 --output ./dist/telepathy-server-linux-armv6
scripts.binary:linux:armv7: npm run build && pkg dist/app.js --target node14-linux-armv7 --output ./dist/telepathy-server-linux-armv7
